casebody.data:
CRUTCHFIELD
v.
CAROLINA FOOTBALL ENTERPRISES, INC. No. COA07-748. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 1, 2008. Certification Date April 21, 2008. Appeal from the NC Industrial Commission (I.C. NO. 383296, I.C. NO. 383297, PH-1061).

Cases Reported Without Published Opinion. Affirmed in part; Vacated in part; Remanded.
